tasks.instruction: Research and create a PRD for an AI-powered image-to-video animation web application, including competitive analysis of available free AI tools (like DeepSeek), integration options with Google Colab, and free API alternatives.
Design the system architecture for the image-to-video animation web application based on Emma's PRD, considering integration with AI services, Google Colab or free APIs.

Develop a web application that converts images to animated videos using AI. Implement the system based on Bob's architecture, integrating with appropriate AI services (DeepSeek or alternatives) via Google Colab or free APIs.
